source: それはちょっとリスク高い。
seed: That's a bit of a high risk.

casual_25.reverse_translation: それはかなり高いリスクだ。

casual_50.reverse_translation: それはかなり高いリスクです。

casual_75.reverse_translation: それはかなりのリスクです。

casual_100.reverse_translation: かなり大きなリスクだ

polite_25.new_translation: The risk level appears to be somewhat elevated.
polite_25.reverse_translation: リスクレベルがやや高いようです

polite_50.new_translation: The risk level is somewhat elevated.
polite_50.reverse_translation: リスクレベルがやや上昇しているようです。

polite_75.new_translation: The risk level is moderately elevated.
polite_75.reverse_translation: リスクレベルは中程度に高まっています。

polite_100.new_translation: The risk level is considerably heightened.
polite_100.reverse_translation: リスクレベルはかなり高くなっています

business_25.new_translation: This does appear to be a rather high risk.
business_25.reverse_translation: これはかなりリスクが高いようです

business_50.new_translation: It does seem to pose a significant risk.
business_50.reverse_translation: 確かにそれはかなりのリスクであるようです

business_75.new_translation: It appears to present a considerable risk.
business_75.reverse_translation: かなりのリスクがあるようです

business_100.new_translation: It appears to pose a significant risk.
business_100.reverse_translation: かなりのリスクがあるようです

source: 今日の納期、明日に延びました。
seed: The deadline for today has been extended to tomorrow.

casual_25.new_translation: Today's deadline has been pushed to tomorrow.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日の締め切りは明日まで延期された.

casual_50.new_translation: The deadline for today got pushed to tomorrow.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで延びた。

casual_75.new_translation: The deadline for today has been pushed to tomorrow.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日の納期が明日まで延期された

casual_100.new_translation: The deadline for today is totes pushed to tomorrow.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日の締め切りは完全に明日まで延期された

polite_25.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

polite_50.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow as of now.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

polite_75.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow, effective immediately.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は、ただいまより、正式に明日まで延長されました。

polite_100.new_translation: It is with utmost formality that I must inform you that the deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow, effective immediately.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は、ただちに明日まで正式に延長された旨をご案内申し上げます。

business_25.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日の締め切りは正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_50.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_75.new_translation: The deadline for today has been formally extended to tomorrow.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

business_100.new_translation: The deadline for today has been officially extended to tomorrow.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日の納期は正式に明日まで延長されました。

source: ありがとう、対応助かります。

casual_25.new_translation: Thank you, I really appreciate your help.
casual_25.reverse_translation: ありがとう、あなたの助けを本当に感謝している。

casual_50.new_translation: Thanks a ton for your help, I super appreciate it!
casual_50.reverse_translation: 本当に助かった、ありがとう！

casual_75.new_translation: Thanks so much for your help, I really appreciate it!

casual_100.new_translation: Thanks a ton for your help, I super appreciate it!
casual_100.reverse_translation: 本当にありがとう助かった

polite_25.reverse_translation: ご協力いただきありがとうございます

polite_50.new_translation: I would like to express my sincere gratitude for your assistance.
polite_50.reverse_translation: ご助力を賜り、心より感謝申し上げます。

polite_75.new_translation: I am deeply grateful for your assistance.
polite_75.reverse_translation: ご助力をいただき、心より感謝申し上げます。

polite_100.new_translation: I am extremely grateful for your assistance.
polite_100.reverse_translation: ご助力を賜り、心より深く感謝しております。

business_25.new_translation: I appreciate your assistance, thank you.
business_25.reverse_translation: ご協力いただき、ありがとうございます

business_50.new_translation: I am grateful for your support.
business_50.reverse_translation: ご支援いただき、感謝しております。

business_75.new_translation: I extend my sincere gratitude for your invaluable support.
business_75.reverse_translation: ご支援いただき、心より感謝申し上げます。

business_100.new_translation: I would like to express my deepest and most sincere appreciation for your highly valuable and instrumental support.
business_100.reverse_translation: ご多大なるご支援を賜り、心より深く感謝申し上げます。

source: それ、聞いた限りだと怪しい。

casual_25.new_translation: Sounds kinda suspicious, from what I've heard.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、ちょっと怪しい感じがする。

casual_50.new_translation: Sounds a bit fishy, from what I've heard.
casual_50.reverse_translation: ちょっと怪しい感じがする、聞いた話では。

casual_75.new_translation: Sounds kinda sketchy, from what I've heard.
casual_75.reverse_translation: なんか怪しいっぽいね、聞いた話では。

casual_100.new_translation: Sounds super shady, from what I've heard.
casual_100.reverse_translation: なんか怪しいらしいよ

polite_25.new_translation: It appears suspicious based on what I've heard.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると怪しい感じがします

polite_50.new_translation: It appears to be suspicious based on what I've heard.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 聞いたところによると怪しいようです。

polite_75.new_translation: It appears to be somewhat suspicious based on what I've heard.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、少し怪しいようです。

polite_100.new_translation: It appears to be somewhat suspicious based on what I've heard.
polite_100.reverse_translation: どうやら少し怪しいようです。

business_25.new_translation: Based on what I've heard, it seems suspicious.
business_25.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、ちょっと怪しい感じがしますね

business_50.new_translation: From what I've heard, it appears to be suspicious.
business_50.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、怪しいようです。

business_75.new_translation: Based on what I've heard, it seems suspicious.
business_75.reverse_translation: 聞いた話によると、怪しいようです。

business_100.new_translation: It appears to be suspicious based on the information I have obtained.
business_100.reverse_translation: 聞いた情報によると、怪しいようです。

source: 今日はもう何も考えられない。
seed: I can't think of anything else today.

casual_25.new_translation: I'm stuck on one thing today.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今のところ、他のことを考えられない

casual_50.new_translation: I'm stuck on one thing today, and I just can't seem to get it out of my head.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日は１つのことが頭から離れない

casual_75.new_translation: I'm totally stuck on this one thing today and I just can't shake it off my mind.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日は１つのことが気になって仕方ない。

casual_100.new_translation: I'm super stuck on this one thing today and I just can't get it out of my head.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日はこの1つのことに完全に頭が支配されてしまって、どうしても考えを切り替えられない。

polite_25.new_translation: I'm unable to think of anything else for today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日はもう何も考えられません

polite_50.new_translation: I am unable to think of anything further for today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日はもう何も考えつきませんでした

polite_75.new_translation: I am presently unable to conceive of anything additional for today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 現在、他に考えつくことがありません

polite_100.new_translation: I am currently incapable of devising any further ideas for today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 現在、他にどのような考えも浮かびません

business_25.new_translation: I am not considering anything else at the moment.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今のところ他のことは考えておりません。

business_50.new_translation: At present, I am not contemplating any other options.
business_50.reverse_translation: 現在、他の選択肢について考えておりません。

business_75.new_translation: Currently, I am not considering any alternative possibilities.
business_75.reverse_translation: 現在、他の選択肢について検討しておりません。

business_100.new_translation: At present, I am not contemplating any supplementary options.
business_100.reverse_translation: 現在、私は他の代替可能性について検討していません。
